column2: JOHNNY DEPP SHOULD RETURN AS CAPTAIN JACK SPARROW
column26: Public Apology from Disney for defaming and cancelling Johnny Depp
column33: Justice for Johnny Depp. Public Apology from DISNEY
column34: Johnny Depp, the famous Captain Jack sparrow, has been maligned and pre-maturely cancelled on false claims of domestic abuse by Amber Heard. Depp, today, got justice and proved in court that he is innocent and the charges are false. Disney dropped Depp from “Pirates of Caribbean” supporting the instant cancel culture which desperately needs to change. We need DISNEY to make a Public apology to Johnny Depp and reinstate him as our Captain Jack Sparrow in the “Pirates of Caribbean” franchise. Otherwise, we announce to boycott the franchise
column36: Justice for Johnny Depp. Demanding Public apology from Disney for destroying a man’s whole career.

column2: This was a great wrong and I can't support the franchise anymore than I do Aquaman. We live in a culture that is too quick to play judge and jury and cast out consequences.  It needs to stop.
